events.message: I am filing a claim due to a car accident that occurred last night involving my vehicle and another driver.
The claim has been categorized under Auto Accident after reviewing the initial report submitted by the customer.
An agent from our auto claims team has been assigned to manage and follow up on the accident claim.
We have officially acknowledged receipt of your auto accident claim and will begin the processing promptly.
Please submit photos of the damaged vehicle, police report, and a copy of your driverâ€™s license to proceed.
The customer has uploaded all requested documents including images of the collision and the official police report.
Our investigation team has begun assessing the details and circumstances surrounding the vehicle collision incident.
The investigation into the auto accident is complete, confirming that the other driver was at fault.
We have sent a settlement proposal to cover the damages to your vehicle and medical costs incurred.
The customer expressed satisfaction with the proposed settlement and appreciated the timely communication.
Your claim for the accident has been officially approved following review of all supporting evidence.
The approved settlement payment has been issued and should reflect in your bank account within three days.
The claim case for your recent auto accident has been closed. We thank you for your cooperation throughout the process.
